primary.context: Caller wanted to make a payment but got stuck in verification
primary.detail: The agent failed to verify the caller's name multiple times despite the caller providing a contract ID, leading to a requested transfer.

steps: Caller requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent attempted account lookup but failed to match the name.
Agent requested spelling and contract ID.
Agent successfully pulled record via contract ID but still failed to verify the name.
Caller became frustrated and requested a representative.
Agent transferred the call to the concierge department.

failure.detail: Agent persisted in name verification loops even after successfully pulling the record via contract ID, causing customer frustration.

clarifications.note: Agent could not match name to record
Second failed attempt to match name
Failed name match after contract ID provided

loops.subject: Name verification
loops.note: Repeatedly failed to verify name despite spelling

actions.detail: Failed to match name to the pulled record
Transferred to concierge at customer request

insights.summary: The caller wanted to pay maintenance fees but was unable to pass the AI's name verification process, even after providing a valid contract ID. This led to the caller requesting a human representative.
insights.verbatim: Talk to representative. Talk Take me to take me to representative. I don't wanna talk to you.
insights.coaching: The agent should have more flexibility in name matching once a contract ID is provided, or offer to send the payment link to the contact on file if a partial match is found.
